page.title: 05Ecology-Ballantrae.
page.content: West maritime climate.Winter cool,warm summer,rain all year,1366mm p.a.Warm gulf stream.SW winds prevail.Frost and gales cause sea erosion from Putting Green northward.Prevention:boulder infill,concrete forming ramp,saving footpath to Parkend,constructed soil levees control river flooding.Flotsam, jetsam,minimal oil pollution.Silage, chemical effluent controlled.Sandstone granite,milky quartz,jasper,agate,sea urchin,Arctic cowrie on shore.Gorse on raised beach burned.Hawthorn hedgerows cut annually.Stinchar hosts dragonfly, cadis,salmon,brown/sea trout,eel,fresh water mussels.Birds-dipper,heron, kingfisher.Valley-pheasants reared,jay weasel,stoat,mink,fox,badger,peregrine kestrel,sparrowhawk,raven-70roe,10red deer stalked.Softwood replaces oak,ash for shelter,timber and shooting cover.
